song_lyrics: Aḷagā na melu re aḷagā na melu re,
Nāth tamane ānkhalḍīthī re aḷagā na melu re... ṭek
Hāre māru manaḍu thayu chhe ghelu re... 1
Hāre me to tamsang bāndhyu chhe belu re... 2
Hāre mane vachan dīdhu chhe ve’lu re... 3
Hāre tāru moḷīḍu rangnu bharelu re... 4
title: Aḷagā na melu re aḷagā na melu

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-307: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
